endpoints.description: Retrieve the comprehensive sustainability rating for a specific product identified by its ID.
Retrieve the hierarchical list of product categories available in the system.
Submit a new product rating with detailed specifications of the assessment.
Search for products in the system by their names or attributes, supporting pagination.
Retrieve a list of products associated with a particular retailer using their ID.
Update detailed information or attributes related to a specific product.
Retrieve the top-rated products within each category based on sustainability.
Remove a specified product and its associated data from the system.
Retrieve a comparative analysis of multiple products based on given IDs.
Generate a detailed report summarizing the environmental impact assessments across products.
